Accessibility Statement

Golden Pathway ("we", "us", or "our") is committed to making our website accessible to as many people as possible, in accordance with the Public Sector Bodies (Websites and Mobile Applications) (No. 2) Accessibility Regulations 2018 and the Equality Act 2010.

Our Commitment

We aim to ensure our website is usable by everyone, regardless of ability or technology. We strive to:

  • Use clear and simple language
  • Ensure sufficient colour contrast
  • Make navigation consistent and logical
  • Support keyboard navigation
  • Provide alternative text for images
  • Use semantic HTML for structure

How Accessible Is This Website?

We know some parts of this website may not be fully accessible. We are continually working to improve accessibility and welcome your feedback.

Reporting Accessibility Problems

If you experience any difficulty accessing information on this site, or would like to suggest improvements, please contact us:

  • Email: info@goldenpathway.co.uk

Enforcement Procedure

If you are not satisfied with our response, you can contact the Equality Advisory and Support Service (EASS) for further advice: www.equalityadvisoryservice.com

Preparation of This Statement

This statement was prepared on 12 November 2025. It will be reviewed and updated as necessary.
